nodes.text: The Mothma estate was the residence of the Mothma family in the prairies of the planet Chandrila. In 0 ABY, Darth Vader of the Galactic Empire sent Ensign Nanda there to investigate the childhood home of Colonel Kell Bircher, a traitor to the Empire. When Nanda discovered tombstones bearing the name of Mothma, Vader realized that Bircher was related to Mon Mothma, leader of the Rebellion against the Empire, and he ordered the destruction of the Mothma estate as an act of revenge.
